document_data.name: Velgor Zolond
document_data.mainbody: '''Velgor Zolond''' was a [[drow]] mage in [[Menzoberranzan]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], Velgor was the second-in-command of [[Ryzliir Symryvvin]] in leading a [[drow]] battalion to intercept an expedition led by some [[adventurer]]s, who'd been hired by [[Bruenor Battlehammer]] to investigate the threat of a [[demon lord]], but she and her troops were defeated.
document_data.Relationship: Velgor was the husband and the second-in-command of [[Ryzliir Symryvvin]].
